structure.unit: ARTICLE XXXVII. MIAMI INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT (WILCOX FIELD) ZONING

law.catch_line: Airport land use zoning nonconforming uses, regulations not retroactive.

text.section:
Sec. 33-338. Airport land use zoning nonconforming uses, regulations not retroactive.
The regulations prescribed by this article or any amendment thereto shall not be construed to require the change or alteration of any permanent structure or use lawfully in existence not conforming to the land use regulations of this article, or otherwise interfere with the lawful continuance of any legal nonconforming use.
